postData.contentHtml: There is a whole category of software utilities that allow you to do this with two of my favorite apps being XMind and Minder. XMind doesn't seem to be FOSS but Minder is and for that reason is my favorite. It allows you to create highly customisable mindmaps that can even be exported so others can view them in multiple formats whether as images, CSVs or Markup styled to list some.
postData.title: Organizing your thoughts visually is called mindmapping
